import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; function Hero() { const [showModel, setShowModel] = useState(false); return (
{!showModel ? ( <> { e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1920x1080?text=Geodome+Flat+Pack'; }} />
